documents.document: Walking to yoga and just passed a guy in big hair and #GnFnR tshirt eating an ice cream. We had to laugh. Must've been an awesome show!
Came home from work to bake but now caught up in the cricket of all damn things! #NZvAUS
I need to go to an art museum and stare at things quietly.
Me, when people ask how my holiday was: "I bought 620 thread count sheets!!!!"
I'm concerned about the diets of the finches on our balcony. All they eat is Dominos pizza crust from the bins.
I rarely read airplane mag articles but just finished one so sparkling and then saw it was written by @delaneymes_! #mustbookraronow
Dear All New Zealand News, please stop saying 'Sorry girls' before the Richie McCaw story. We're not all fucking heartbroken.
Mom is commenting on every friend's pics of babies but ignoring my pic of adorable chilli hot dog.
Carrie Fucking Glorious Fisher?!
Claire Danes really cried herself gloriously through the 90s didn't she #littlewomen
Just @AmericanAir counter guy saying 'You're not in our system' and sending us to Qantas. THAT was our communication.
@AmericanAir No one let Qantas or House of Travel or us know as we were ON our connecting flight to AKL.
Seriously @Qantas you may just want to get your own planes from AKL-LAX. Surely you don't treat your partners like this. #secretlybumped
Hey @AmericanAir maybe don't have partnerships with other airlines if you're going to bump their passengers without telling anyone.
Why do I still get the most insane reactions to NZ bug bites! You'd think I'd start getting some vaccinative type effect after the 5th. :/
Turns out I'll be in LA during the Golden Globes, so please pass on contact details of wise old screenwriters for viewing party, thanks!
The hangover is strong with this one...
I made the most amazing guacamole to go with nacho night and then we completely forgot to put it on. Today blows.
Just snuck on a seasonal rom com while the boyfriend's napping HA!
@AstroKatie Never trust anyone who doesn't like supermassive black holes or dogs.
It's moments like these I wonder why I haven't downloaded "We Built This City" yet. #afterworkdrinks
@BrianZakrajsek Totally, that one's forgivable. It's when people start doing "beer's" instead of "beers" that I start grammar hulk raging.
All I want for Christmas is for sign writers around the world to know the difference between plurals and possessives.
Just once I wish my afternoon apple had fermented and I got to spend the day accidentally drunk like the mooses.
A little finch just skidded across the side of my head on its way home so yeah, weird fukin day.
Tree is up, stockings hung on the wine rack, iPod loaded with the Christmas tunes, this is not a drill people!
Dear nose, stop sneezing. You're really starting to look stupid.
How cool--I bought Bic Runga's album in the US after 'American Pie' and this is the first time I've heard her speak! #VNZMA2016
Actually everyone, these earthquakes happened because I've been having incredible luck with avocados lately. Sorry all.
@BrianZakrajsek I support all the postings.
"Let's go to bed and snuggle and wait for the next earthquake." Full of romance this guy. #eqnz
Debating whether I want to continue watching the bleak Humans tonight. I feel like I just need princesses and singing animals. #eqnz
Craft beer community is so epic in Wellington, I think everyone just took comfort in going to their favorite bar for a pint today.ðŸ’™ #eqnz
There was a loud bang near Te Aro last night, I think after an aftershock, I thought a billboard went down or something, anyone know? #eqnz
@AshKessler Freaking wild.
@AshKessler yeah just aftershocks like every 10 minutes, heart pounding all night, but everyone is safe which is the important thing.
This is apparently our life now. #aftershock #eqnz
Fuck November and everything it stands for right now #eqnz
Thank god the street sweeper is still going #wellingtonnz #eqnz
I like throwing house parties because I can lie on the floor after a big meal and no one can judge me or kick me out, HA.
Hey US, New Zealand is lovely this time of century! #USElection2016
Wearing my gang neutral purple today. #ElectionNight
This is a solution?? JUST DELIVER TO MY APARTMENT. https://t.co/uIQD9fDgEN
Need a service that will deliver your jacket at home on warm sunny afternoons in Wellington.
MAY have just impulse bought cookies from Auckland while diligently cooking a nice veggie pasta...
Yep, @funnygirlsnz keeps getting killerer. Need dvds to give all my sisters (there's three!).
Just want to give a big shout out to me three years ago for buying health insurance.
Just realized I made quite the superhero choice in yoga tights and boots today. https://t.co/auRDp79ijW
Friends abandoned me at the table in the bar where I had to suddenly entertain a stag do: "I felt like a verbal stripper!!"
Just saw a bunch of tradies honk and catcall a woman just walking home from work. Good job guys you sufficiently bro-ed.
Working with filo for the first time ever and guess what, I fucking hate working with filo. #dinnerat9pm
Once again, complete failure of another NZ courier to deliver a package in this country. #YOUCANT
Is there a power point in this manor tent for the filming equipment?? Must be a pack of corgis on a treadmill. #GBBO
What even is this show. It's so gloriously British. #greatbritishbakeoff #GBBO
I'm really glad this rental car didn't have a 'no eating pies in the vehicle' clause. #nothingtoseehere #justsomecrustybits
Fridays are absolutely for singing along to Taylor Swift while attempting a homemade chocolate sauce for your hokey pokey ice cream.
New toilets at work sound like an angry puma when they auto-flush and make you shit yourself, so now they're dubbed poomas.
Wellington, you are making me look reeeally stupid for wearing black tights today.
Trying reformer pilates in the morning and I have no idea how that machine works. I feel like Juno's dad, "So uh what do you make with it?"
This course of antibiotics is completely ruining my afternoon snacking schedule. #radioactivespiderbite
Everything is itchyyyy, everything's uncool when a spider bites you....
I'll never forget how I found an a Arnold Palmer Restaurant Myrtle Beach golf tee at a highway rest stop and treasured it for way too long.
Got stung by something over in Martinborough and now my ankle is swelling and itchy and everything is awful.
@AshleyMarieLIFE I know lol, it was on NZ national news last night. We're behind.
Just re-programmed Prime and Bravo+1--now I know how the cavewomen felt when they created fire.
What I'm not crying at the news story of a house surveillance camera that caught a boy who stopped to HUG A DOG every day after school. ðŸ˜¢
Water is out in our apartment and I'm just SO GLAD no one has to poo. #blessed #TeAro
New Zealand's Honey Badger, #LiamMalone #newcyborgoverlord #Paralympics
@funnygirlsnz Is there a DVD for Season 1? I want to buy it for literally everyone I know overseas.
I think I get it now: 10 Things I Hate About You is the sequel to Two Hands. #HeathLedger
90s movies made me think I'd have a lot more issues in my adult life with criminals running red lights at intersections.
@agoodlibrarian @mollybackes ha I feel like that all the time when teenagers ask me questions--I'm like 'how much can I tell them??'
Pretty well-convinced our apartment is going to blow away. #Wellington
TV3's ads are so loud I'm becoming into my dad and turning down the volume every ad break.
Took freshly baked cookies to view an apartment we might buy. Am I doing it wrong?
Just saw a dad pick up the whole stroller so his toddler could push the street crossing button. #parentingwin #plusweightlifting
Me at work this morning: "Earthquakes, I mean right?" #eqnz
OK yep I'm awake. Heard the dumpster in the alley moving. #eqnz #wellington
Wait what? There's a week off until #AFLFinals??? #LivingInNewZealand
@SeanDG cool will look for that one! Keen for some good scripted tv.
Watching #cleverman, this is some damn good tv!
If anyone sees the dickhead in Darwin who's trying to scam my sweet mother, please punch him in the face for me.

Final Wellington on a Plate tally:
20 burgers 9 events 3 cocktails .7kg gained
#wellyonaplate #burgerwelly #missionaccomplished
Some might say I love #burgerwelly too much. #wellyonaplate https://t.co/HKBNG7M2EB
I have a lot in common with the Olympic athletes in that I too have eaten an obscene amount of burgers in recent days. #burgerwelly
Didn't win #bakingitbetter challenge, but now have a delightful IPA Caramel Sauce recipe in the repertoire! Cheers bitches! #wellyonaplate
Yessss made it to the #doughnutpopup today! Excited for my tiramisu and pistachio cream! #wellyonaplate https://t.co/k3ox9BLGiN
Must say, the Olympics coverage by @Primetv_NZ is amazing, but a wee "live" or "replay" in the screen corner wouldn't go astray!
People posting pics today having their first #burgerwelly and I'm just YOU ARE NOT COMMITTED TO THE CAUSE I JUST FINISHED SEVEN.
Just tripped up the stairs after last night slamming the laundry door into my own head. This has not been my favorite 24 hours.
FYI ladies the socially acceptable way to place your drink at #beervana https://t.co/GiCc7I4kOb
I really hate this concourse sometimes. #beervana https://t.co/GO9nk98ojE
Just told my yoga teacher I have to miss the next two Thursday classes due to burger dates. #burgerwelly #WellyOnaPlate
Thanks to the body positive message from Anne Hathaway, I'm no longer worried about gaining weight for #WellyOnaPlate #BringOnTheBurgers
Ah the christening of bird shit on my brand new jacket. #Wellington
Beervana is 10 days away and I still need to sort my manicure. It's like I'm not even trying.
@RobynLStiles Ah that explains the random chant from the tv viewer's side.
Walking home from yoga planning my pre-dinner cheese #adulting
Note to self: Do not write a moving email while accidentally listening to Phil Collins 'Take Me Home'--totally teared up like a dork.
Probably the best airport welcome home sign I've ever done. #cheese https://t.co/FCi28MKCEg
